Custom HTML Timed - Particle for Gantry Framework

 Andreas Kar (andreas.kar@gmx.at)

NOTE: This Particle was installed for Gantry Hydrogen.
If you want to install the Particle for a different Gantry template, you must place the files as follows:

  • *.yaml => /templates/[TEMPLATE]/custom/particles
  • *.twig => /templates/[TEMPLATE]/custom/particles
